database.name: VIEW OBPOS_CATEGORIESIMAGE
database.view: SELECT c.obpos_categories_id, c.ad_client_id, c.ad_org_id, c.isactive, c.created, c.createdby, c.updated, c.updatedby, c.name, c.parent_obpos_categories_id, img.binarydata FROM obpos_categories c LEFT JOIN ad_image img ON img.ad_image_id = c.ad_image_id
